Package sophiabcrypt

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SbcAboutWindow
    This class is used to show a "About Program Window"
    SbcEncEngine
    This a main engine class of SophiaBCrypt.
    SbcEncryptor
    This class has two simple methods: encrypt and decrypt.
    SbcExitWindow
    This class is used to show a new form "Do you really want quit of program"
    SbcMainWindow
    This class is a main GUI for SophiaBCrypt It shows a graphical interface for the user to select files or folders and to be able to choose the operations of Encrypt or Decrypt
    SbcPlanFile
    This class control all details about Encrypt and Decrypt operations.
    SbcProgressWindow
    This class create a new "Process Window with progress bar and labels" They are used while SophiaBTool encrypt or decrypt data
    SbcPswControl
    This class can be validate password policy (if both are same, minimal length, formation) By the way, SophiaBCrypt just allow password with: 1 - That has at least 1 lowercase or uppercase letter 2 - That has at least 1 number 3 - That has at least 1 Special Char 4 - That has at least 8 Chars of length
    SbcPswWindow
    This class create a new "Input Your Password Window" and start process of encrypt or decrypt
    SbcVersion
    This class store the information about version and build date of last SophiaBCrypt
    SophiaBCrypt
    This is a Main Class of SophiaBCrypt
